hero.name: Luca Bazzanella
hero.description: Italian manager, born in 1991, with a background as an advisor within the European Parliament. Specialized in outsourced business management and ICT, with particular experience in public policy analysis and institutional relations. Always interested in social sector, he is the president of the Sustainable Economy Association, a non-profit organization engaged in international projects with a special focus on North Africa and advocacy actions in favor of new technologies for decarbonization and president of Ermetes, a social cooperative construction company. From 2019 to 2021, he served as Head of the Europe Office for Confcommercio Trentino, the leading Italian association for small and medium-sized enterprises, and since 2020, he has been an administrator and operational director of the consulting firm European Management Institute. In the past, he held various political coordination roles at regional and national levels within Forza Italia – PDL, leaving all positions in December 2022. He has always been keen on finding the right balance between corporate efficiency and social impact.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: Economy and finance for their own sake are useless if they do not generate a positive impact on people, society, and the planet. This belief leads me to invest a large part of the company's revenues each year in activities with a positive and measurable social impact.

organizations.title: European Management Institute
organizations.description: A consulting firm specialized in outsourced management, business efficiency, and public policy analysis. European Management has established itself in the business consulting market by using 'outcome-based' contracts as a competitive tool, which reduce client risk by tying compensation to the actual achievement of specific agreed business performance targets.

organizations.title: Cooperativa Ermetes SCS
organizations.description: A Trentino-based cooperative with a mutualistic purpose that supports the employment of worker-members through construction and maintenance activities. Under the new presidency and management, a new system for measuring social impact and a 'C-level' corporate management system were introduced, aiming to bring efficiency and competitiveness by directly and proactively involving all worker-members.
organizations.approach: Under the new presidency and management, a new system for measuring social impact and a 'C-level' corporate management system were introduced, aiming to bring efficiency and competitiveness by directly and proactively involving all worker-members.

organizations.title: Sustainable Economy Association ODV
organizations.description: A non-profit organization founded in 2016 in Brussels and later developed in Italy, starting from Trentino where it has its main headquarters. Its mission is to rethink territorial development and, more generally, economic growth from a sustainable perspective, in contrast to the theory of 'happy degrowth' typical of ideological environmentalism. It organizes conferences, advocacy actions, and participates in European and international projects.

publicPolicy.title: Public Policy
publicPolicy.heroDescription: Public policy analysis is a systematic monitoring activity of political and institutional strategies carried out by specialized companies or professionals, often on behalf of large companies or interest groups. The goal is to be more aware of the risks and opportunities arising from current or future political and legislative changes, to simulate their impact on business models, and to plan activities and investments accordingly.

content.intro: Outsourced management is a practice, mainly adopted by large companies in phases of growth or change, that choose to entrust experienced external managers or specialized companies with turnkey project management or the achievement of specific objectives: extraordinary operations, finance, market development, tenders/contracts, digitalization, and much more. The goal is to increase efficiency and focus attention on the core business.
content.approach: We use a data-driven approach and accept challenging contracts, including outcome-based types, compensated according to agreed performance indicators. This ensures our clients receive tangible results and measurable improvements.

socialImpact.description: Economy and finance, in and of themselves, are meaningless unless they generate a positive impact on people, society, and the planet. This belief has led me to invest a large part of my income in activities with a positive and measurable social impact. I’ve never fully believed in charity carried out by third parties through donations; for this reason, I prefer to personally dedicate part of my time to concrete local volunteer work and international cooperation initiatives.
